Title: কবি গোলাম মোস্তফা : স্মৃতি ও আবদান
Author: মুনশী আবদুল মান্নান
Book_Title: কবি গোলাম মোস্তফা : স্মৃতি ও আবদান

Title: বাংলাদেশের গ্রন্থ, গ্রন্থাগার ও অন্যান্য প্রবন্ধ
Author: মোহাম্মদ জিল্লুর রহমান

Title: Modern Medical Microbiology
Author: ডি. রায় চৌধুরী
Summary:
This medical microbiology book is useful to the Undergraduate student. As because the microbiology subject has been separated from the pathology in the syllabus of undergraduate medical education in 1993-94 in Bangladesh, this book helps the student to understand very easily by reading this book.
The language of the book is very simple and easily understandable regarding microbiology. It covers all the aspects of medical microbiology as well as the part of immunology.
I appreciate this effort for giving an opportunity to the medical students. The edition should be revised and new horizon of diagnostics as well as emerging infectius organisms should be included so that the medical students can be up-to-date about the current status of the infectious disease.
